Class MovePruner

java.lang.Object
AI.mcts.Optimazation.MovePruner
public class MovePruner extends Object
A move pruning utility that reduces the branching factor in game tree search by filtering out less promising moves based on heuristic evaluation.

The pruner works by scoring all legal moves using a heuristic function, then keeping only moves whose scores are within a threshold of the maximum score. This reduces the search space while retaining the most strategically valuable moves. A minimum number of moves is always kept to prevent over-pruning.

This is particularly useful in MCTS (Monte Carlo Tree Search) to focus computational resources on more promising moves.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovePruner

      public MovePruner(double threshold, int minMoves, Heuristic heuristic)
      Creates a new move pruner with the specified configuration. This constructor allows different agents to use different pruning settings, which is useful for testing and tuning.
      Parameters:
      threshold - the score difference threshold; only moves with scores within this range of the maximum score are kept (smaller values result in more aggressive pruning)
      minMoves - the minimum number of moves to keep regardless of scores, to prevent over-pruning
      heuristic - the heuristic function used to score moves

  • Method Details

    • pruneMoves

      public List<Move> pruneMoves(GameState state, List<Move> legalMoves)
      Prunes a list of legal moves, keeping only the most promising ones based on heuristic evaluation.

      The pruning algorithm:

      1. Scores all legal moves using the heuristic
      2. Finds the maximum score
      3. Keeps moves with scores >= (maxScore - threshold)
      4. If fewer than minMoves remain, keeps the top minMoves by score instead
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      legalMoves - the list of all legal moves to consider
      Returns:
      a pruned list containing only the most promising moves, with at least minMoves entries (unless fewer legal moves exist)

    • getThreshold

      public double getThreshold()
      Returns the threshold value used by this pruner.
      Returns:
      the score difference threshold

    • getHeuristic

      public Heuristic getHeuristic()
      Returns the heuristic function used by this pruner.
      Returns:
      the heuristic used for scoring moves
